isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - REMOVE - Remove OUTER DOOR HANDLE

svcproc.title: Remove OUTER DOOR HANDLE
svcproc.para: The outer door handle assembly (Item 1, Figure 79) is a combination handle and lever. It is connected by control rods to the latch assembly mechanism, and actuates the latch jaws. You can remove the outer door handle without removing the latch assembly.

figure.caption: Figure 79. Driver Side Outer Door Handle Control Rod

svcproc.para: If removing DRIVER SIDE OUTER DOOR HANDLE ASSEMBLY follow Steps 1, 2 and 3 below to gain access to inside of door.

step1.para:
Remove driver side cab door lower trim panel from cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Remove Driver Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.

Remove driver side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly from cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Remove Driver Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.
Once driver side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly is removed, place it on a padded work surface and continue with Step 7 below.

svcproc.para: If removing PASSENGER SIDE OUTER DOOR HANDLE ASSEMBLY follow Steps 4, 5 and 6 below to gain access to inside of door.

step1.para:
Remove passenger side cab door lower trim panel from cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Remove Passenger Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.

Remove passenger side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly from cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Remove Passenger Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.
Once passenger side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly is removed, place it on a padded work surface and continue with Step 7 below.

caution.para: To prevent damage to the door while fully open, reinstall the door check strap.

svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 78 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Slide retaining clip (Item 1) from lock control rod (Item 2) and remove it from door lock cylinder assembly (Item 3), driver side shown.

svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 79 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Slide retaining clip (Item 2) from outer door handle control rod (Item 3) and remove it from outer door handle assembly (Item 1), driver side shown.

svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 78 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove four hex nuts and washers (Item 6) on inside of door and remove outer door handle assembly (Item 7) from cab door (Item 5), driver side shown.
